description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              COACH   ERP Application Manager
              
              TEAM    Business Systems, Information Technology
              

              POSITION SUMMARY
              
              As the Business Analyst you would be responsible for analyzing and modelling existing business processes. The goal of business process analysis is to understand and document current business procedures and identify areas for improvement.  A thorough understanding of the current state of the requirements, constraints and assumptions is necessary prior to recommending changes related to implementing a new business solution.
              

              The business analyst uses modelling tools to document the current state of business processes as well as the desired future state. The business analyst is responsible for the knowledge transfer of business implications to the application/database developers and project managers.  The business analyst will actively participate in the testing of solutions and transfer of knowledge to the business.
              


              ACCOUNTABILITY SUMMARY
              
              To Co-workers: Collaborative support on initiatives.
              
              To Employees:  Effective analysis workshops supported with accurate and timely communication.
              
              To Owners:  Identification of process opportunities for review.
              

              SPECIFIC RESPONSIBILITIES
              
              •	Take a leadership position in driving process improvements across all areas of the business
              
              •	Facilitates workshops with business stakeholders to gather and document business and, system requirements
              
              •	Perform feasibility analysis, contain project scope, and work with the user and technical teams to prioritize deliverables, and negotiate on product functionalities.
              
              •	Create detailed Functional Design/Business Requirement Documents (FDD/BRD) and translate to functional specifications
              
              •	Partners with development and analytical teams to attain software and process based solutions
              
              •	Support the creation of user manuals that document processes
              
              •	Lead projects through various testing phases (Functional testing, Integration Testing and User Acceptance Testing (UAT).
              
              •	Develops test strategies, plans and scripts and executes and documents tests of technology solutions and business processes and validation of applications
              
              •	Provide user training
              
              •	Communicate progress on initiatives to project stakeholders
              
              •	Provide support to local and remote departmental users
              
              •	Travel to Canada and USA as needed
              

              PERFORMANCE MEASUREMENTS
              
              •	Ensure the FDD/BRD is comprehensive well written
              
              •	Ensure project work  are on time and at the required level of quality.
              
              •	Ability identify business  requirements in an efficient and organized manner
              
              •	Ability to work seamlessly at all levels of the organization
              
              •	Ability to resolve issues and conflicting opinions on solutions
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              •	5+ years' experience in process analysis
              
              •	Proven experience with Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009/2012 R2/R3 OR 365
              
              •	Strong business acumen and understanding of various business disciplines (finance, manufacturing, technical etc.)
              
              •	Excellent organizational and communication skills (verbal and written)
              
              •	Detail oriented, self-motivated individual
              
              •	Ability to motivate co-workers toward a common goal
              
              •	Excellent command of Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio)
